data.comment: The match is underway in Vigo.
Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Granada.
In the minute 4, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 7, Celta Vigo pushes forward through Santi Mina, whose finish on goal is saved.
Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
In Vigo Celta Vigo attack through Nestor Araujo. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 7, Goal kick for Granada at Municipal de Balaidos.
Can Granada get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
Free kick for Granada in their own half.
In the minute 11, Celta Vigo's Nolito gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vigo.
Free kick Granada.
In the minute 13, Granada to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a Granada throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
Free kick for Granada in the half of Celta Vigo.
In the minute 16, Luis Milla for Granada gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Celta Vigo goal kick.
Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 19, Celta Vigo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Celta Vigo's Hugo Mallo is on target but unsuccessful.
Jeison Murillo (Celta Vigo) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Granada take a 0-1 lead thanks to Luis Suarez.
That's a fine assist from Luis Milla.
In the minute 27, Goal! Celta Vigo go level at 1-1 through Nolito in Vigo.
Lucas Olaza instrumental with a fine assist.
Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
In the minute 33, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Celta Vigo.
Throw-in for Granada in their own half.
Celta Vigo are whistled for offside.
In the minute 37, Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Granada in the half of Celta Vigo.
Granada's Yangel Herrera breaks free at Municipal de Balaidos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
Carlos Neva for Granada drives towards goal at Municipal de Balaidos. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Granada are coming forward and Jorge Molina gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 43, Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Granada's Luis Milla gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Celta Vigo goal kick.
In the minute 45, Granada awarded a throw-in in their own half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Celta Vigo's Renato Tapia has been booked in Vigo.
The second-half has started.
Granada make their first substitution with Antonio Puertas replacing Jorge Molina.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
Celta Vigo drive upfield and Nolito gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Granada defender.
In the minute 52, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a Celta Vigo throw-in in Granada's half.
Dimitri Foulquier (Granada) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 54, Can Celta Vigo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Denis Suarez of Celta Vigo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards Granada a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Santi Mina for Celta Vigo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vigo.
Granada's Yangel Herrera breaks free at Municipal de Balaidos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 58, Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
In the minute 60, Granada to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
Maxime Gonalons is on a sub for Yangel Herrera for Granada.
Roberto Soldado is replacing Luis Suarez for the away team.
In the minute 61, Can Granada get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
Free kick for Celta Vigo in the half of Granada.
In Vigo Celta Vigo attack through Renato Tapia. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the away team in Vigo.
Lucas Olaza is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in for Granada at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 66, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards the away team a throw-in.
Lucas Olaza for Celta Vigo is back on the field again.
Free kick for Granada in their own half.
In the minute 67, Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
In Vigo Celta Vigo attack through Nolito. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 71, Granada have a goal kick.
Celta Vigo are caught offside.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
In the minute 74, The home team have replaced Nolito with Miguel Baeza. This is the second substitution made today by Eduardo Coudet.
The home team replace Denis Suarez with Okay Yokuslu.
Throw-in Celta Vigo.
Throw-in Granada.
In the minute 76, Quini is replacing Dimitri Foulquier for Granada at Municipal de Balaidos.
Granada awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Granada in their own half.
Throw-in for Granada in the half of Celta Vigo.
Miguel Baeza scores to make it 2-1 at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 83, The away team replace Jesus Vallejo with Alberto Soro.
Fran Beltran is on a sub for Santi Mina for Celta Vigo.
Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, It's now 3-1 in Vigo as Fran Beltran scores for Celta Vigo.
Great play from Iago Aspas to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Granada in their own half.
In the minute 88, Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 89, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in the half of Granada.
Granada have a dangerous throw-in.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Vigo.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a Granada throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
Granada drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Granada.
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Eduardo Coudet (Celta Vigo) is making a fourth substitution, with Joseph Aidoo replacing Brais Mendez.
Lucas Olaza (Celta Vigo) has received a first yellow card.
At Municipal de Balaidos, Antonio Puertas has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Roberto Soldado for Granada has been booked by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos and receives a first yellow card.
Okay Yokuslu (Celta Vigo) has received a yellow card from Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
Hugo Mallo is booked for the home team.
Okay Yokuslu (Celta Vigo) has been shown a straight red card by referee Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
